comments:
I don't have exact steps, but I 've clicked Team -> Show Annotation on a CU currently editing and ran into connection problems. Then I ended up with this NPE which was getting rethrown when I scrolled.

Framework arguments:  -showLocation
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -showLocation -data C:\eclipse\verifying

I don't think this is critical for 3.2 so we'll address it in 3.2.1. The solution will most likely be to return the current date if the entry is null. This code was actually contributed by Tom so I'm copying him in case he has something to add.

Created an attachment (id=41164)
ShowAnnotationOperation.java.diff

ShowAnnotationOperation::createRevisionInformation has several flaws:

- the Team/CVSException should not be caught, but rather passed up the framework
- the ILogEntries should be checked for null.

The attached patch fixes these two issues, but I agree this is not critical enough for RC4.

Fix has been released to HEAD. We need to wait until 3.2 ships before we put it
in the 3.2 maintenance branch.
